faqs.question: What is the concentration of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum?
faqs.answer: The concentration of GlowBoost Vitamin C Serum is 10% Vitamin C.

faqs.answer: Key ingredients include: Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid.
